sentences: Patricia Jünger was born during an airplane trip from Dublin to Vienna, at a stop in Frankfurt am Main and has Swiss and Austrian citizenship.

Patricia Jünger was born during an airplane trip from Dublin to Vienna, at a stop in Frankfurt am Main and has Swiss and Austrian citizenship. Jünger studied piano, organ, composition and directing in Frankfurt am Main, Vienna and Paris.
She completed her studies in 1977 and then became a full-time composer.
Recently she has leaned toward more electroacoustic works.
Patricia Jünger: Eva Csapo, Collegium Musicum Zürich, Musiques Suisses (CD, 2006), ASIN: B000J10K4Q
Bright Light, for mezzo-soprano, clarinet, drums and orchestra (MGB, DDD, 1989)
